relics.name: Magic Rod
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Hook into your hand.
relics.flavorText: You can catch something big with this.

relics.name: Lifebuoy
relics.description: For the first 3 turns of combat, gain 3 Block at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Brightly colored to attract underwater predators.

relics.name: Cenozoic Tooth
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power, gain 2 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact from a long forgotten age.

relics.name: Worn Oar
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 3 Swim.

relics.name: Caviar
relics.description: Whenever you add a Common card to your deck, it is Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: A delicious treat and exotic type of egg.

relics.name: Amoeba
relics.description: Gain [B] and add a Slimed into your hand at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: This single-celled organism is ominously shaking.

relics.name: Platinum Reel
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 2 Upgraded Hooks into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Why is it so shiny? The more you look at it, the more it sparkles.

relics.name: Oven Mitt
relics.description: You do not take damage from Mines.

keywords.name: Deep
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card on the bottom of your deck.

keywords.name: Entangle
keywords.description: Entangled prevents you from attacking for a turn.

keywords.name: Freeze
keywords.description: Frozen cards unfreeze when played instead of their normal effect.

keywords.name: Mines
keywords.description: When you attack an enemy with Mines, deal damage equal to the amount of Mines, and take damage equal to 20% of the amount of Mines.

keywords.name: Plated armor
keywords.description: Gains Block at the end of each turn. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.

keywords.name: Swim
keywords.description: Whenever you play an Attack, draw 1 card and lose 1 Swim.
